bike.description: Reynolds 631 seamless air-hardened chromoly main tubes, SST tubing diameters, sloping top tube design, double-tapered heat-treated stays, reinforced head tube collars, lost wax dropouts with single eyelet

components.description: Jamis Road carbon composite with forged alloy dropouts with single eyelet
Ritchey Comp Zeta wheelset, 20/24H, 24mm rim profile, cold forged hubs with cup and cone bearings and DT Competition spokes
Shimano 105 RD-5700 rear and Shimano 105 FD-5700 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
Shimano BR450 Super SLR long reach dual pivot calipers with adjustable pads and Shimano 105 ST-5700 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/65) 440mm (58/61)
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Road, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seatpin
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
